answers.answer: Hormones honey...I get like that without realizing sometimes. If I can help it I try to contain it
Yes BDS don't understand how serious them cravings are..I get so mad when I'm told no
Aahhhh lucky you :( whatd you get to eat!! Lol.Yess dang hormones! I mean i can handle it BUT ive eat a little well a bit of everything i have and im still wanting sonic lol.

Right! He says"noooo youve ate out 2 times already" i mean he usally doesnt say anything i guesd b4 i got pregnany i hardly ate out so he wants me to be healthy and the baby i get that BUT I JUST WANT IT DONT ARGUE HONEY lol. He just is a weird one
I usually use the "crying" trick and my hubby goes into superhero mode on a mission. :)

I work at sonic!! And all I crave is icecream it *****!! I am so tempted to eat all the time but I don't want to get diabetes or gain too much unneeded weight sobi try to limit myself to one small thing of icecream a day :(
Haha I got mad at my boyfriend because I wanted a green apple slushy with nerds from sonic and chick fil a too lol

question: Whyyyy am i mad for my husband not taking me to sonic. Or anything out to eat. Lol ive been craving fast food but he doesnt understand so now hes dealing with my moods.I would drive but i need my glasses at night time to drive and i left em over at my moms.
title: whhyyyy does craving get the best of u.
